data.name: COME ALIVE! - Fan Pack
data.detailed_description:
The game is free, but you can support me by buying this fan pack which includes all of the standing character sprites (in addition to more goodies that will be specified as we near release)!

♡♡

To find them:
1. Open Steam, go to the Library tab, and right-click on COME ALIVE! in your game list.
2. Select Properties and click the Local Files tab.
3. Click the Browse Local Files... button.
4. Open the "Fan Pack" folder.

Thanks so much for playing and supporting!
